item.title: FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time coming to Switch 2
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/fantasy-life-i-the-girl-who-steals-time-coming-to-switch-2

  • Switch 2

Release date to be announced.

Publisher LEVEL-5 and developer LEVEL-5 Osaka Office will release a “Nintendo Switch 2 Edition” of social slow-life RPG FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time, the companies announced. A release date was not announced.

The Switch 2 version will run at a higher resolution and frame rate compared to the Switch version, according to the game’s official website.

Users who own the Switch version of FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time will be able to purchase a “Nintendo Switch 2 Edition Upgrade Pack” to upgrade to the Switch 2 version. The upgrade pack will cost 300 yen in Japan. Pricing for the west was not announced. The Switch 2 version can also be purchased individually for 7,978 yen in Japan, while the Switch version is priced at 7,678 yen.

LEVEL-5 did not announce any plans to release a standalone physical edition of FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time for Switch 2 in Japan, where the game will be available physically for PlayStation 5 and Switch.

FANTASY LIFE i: The Girl Who Steals Time is due out for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, PlayStation 4, Switch, and PC via Steam on May 21 worldwide.

item.title: Natsu-Mon! 20th Century Summer Kid + Broadcast Over Sunset physical bundle for Switch launches July 10 in Japan
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/natsu-mon-20th-century-summer-kid-broadcast-over-sunset-physical-bundle-for-switch-launches-july-10-in-japan

  • Switch

Includes the base game and downloadable content.

Spike Chunsoft will release a Natsu-Mon! 20th Century Summer Kid + Broadcast Over Sunset physical bundle for Switch on July 10 in Japan for 3,850 yen, the company announced.

As its title implies, the bundle includes the base game Natsu-Mon! 20th Century Summer Kid and the downloadable content “Broadcast Over Sunset.”

Both the base game and downloadable content are currently available digitally for Switch and PC via Steam worldwide. The base game is also available physically for Switch in Japan.

item.title: Operation Night Strikers official trailer
item.content:encoded:
https://www.gematsu.com/2025/05/operation-night-strikers-official-trailer

  • PC
  • Switch

80s arcade games collection due out on August 7.

Publisher TAITO and developer M2 have released the official trailer for 80s arcade games collection Operation Night Strikers.

Here is an overview of the collection, via its Steam page:

About

Operation Wolf and Night Striker, two milestones of the 80s arcade movement in one action-packed compilation! Relieve all the high-speed arcade thrills and explosive spills!

Title Lineup

  • Operation Wolf (Versions: Arcade, Famicom, NES, SEGA Master System)
  • Operation Thunderbolt (Versions: Arcade, SNES)
  • Night Striker (Versions: Arcade, Mega CD)
  • Space Gun (Versions: Arcade, SEGA Master System)

Operation Wolf

Using only a machine gun and rocket-propelled grenades, you alone must infiltrate enemy territory, secure the hostages, then get them safely to the extraction point! The mission code is Operation Wolf.

Operation Thunderbolt

A hostage rescue mission in Africa and only one man can help! Roy Adams, hero of Operation Wolf is back, and this time his former green beret team-mate, Hardy Jones joins the fight. Your mission code is Operation Thunderbolt. Impossible odds are nothing to these men!

Night Striker

Become a member of the United Nations Special Action Force, a.k.a. Night Striker, and destroy the enemy terrorist organization with in your high-speed combat hovercraft: Intergray!

Space Gun

2039 AD: an age of space exploration. On their way to investigate an unexplained incident on a space station, a team of space marines receive a distress call from a cargo ship, but what could prepare them for the horrors onboard?! Use your multi-purpose rifle to slay the monsters and rescue the hostages!

Four faithful ports, complete with various gadgets, replay functions, and other useful features to enhance the originals!

Key Features

  • Apply filters to simulate actual arcade monitors.
  • New gadgets to display various useful information.
  • Includes multiple arcade versions of each title.
  • Save / load anytime during play.
  • Upload your own play data, or download and view top ranking players’ data.
  • Compatible with the Cyber Stick intelligent controller.

Operation Night Strikers is due out for Switch and PC via Steam on August 7. The Special Edition includes download code for early access to the new game NIGHT STRIKER GEAR. Read more about the collection’s various editions and what they include here.
